parameter.name: backup_files
parameter.label: Backup files
parameter.description: Sets the number of backup files to keep.

parameter.name: write_delay
parameter.label: Write delay
parameter.description: Sets the time to wait before writing changes to disk. This can reduce the number of writes when many changes are being introduced within a short period. Time is defined in milliseconds.

parameter.name: max_defer_delay
parameter.label: Maximum write delay
parameter.description: Sets the maximum period the service will wait to write data to disk in the event that many changes are happening continually.
